Pemkot Baubau Matangkan Persiapan FKMA Asean 2019
03 Nov 2019, 14:14 by Afrian Syah


Pemkot Baubau Matangkan Persiapan FKMA Asean 2019

KBRN, Baubau : Pemerintah Kota (Pemkot) Baubau Sulawesi Tenggara(Sultra) sebagai tuan rumah semakin memantapkan persiapan pelaksanaan Festival Keraton Masyarakat Adat (FKMA) Asean ke-VI Polima yang rencananya digelar 18-21 November 2019.
Sekretaris Daerah Kota Baubau, Roni Muhtar mengatakan persiapan teknis dalam penyelanggaraan event Internasional tersebut sudah dibahas secara rinci oleh panitia daerah.
Adapun beberapa lokasi yang nanti menjadi pusat pelaksanaan FKMA di Baubau diantaranya Baruga Masjid Agung Keraton Kesultanan Buton, Kawasan public Kota Mara, dan Palagimata.
Roni mengatakan, panitia daerah yang terdiri dari organisasi perangkat daerah(OPD) sudah bersepakat untuk melaksanakan tugas sebaik mungkin agar tamu-tamu yang diundang bisa mendapatkan pelayanan maksimal selama rangkaian FKMA.
"Persiapan teknis kita sudah bahas terperinci. Agar mereka (tamu) yang hadir di Baubau bisa mendapatkan pelayanan yang baik mulai dari penginapan, tempat makan dan sebagainya. Sehingga saat meninggalkan Baubau, mereka membawa pulang kesan positif bahwa Baubau luar biasa," ujar Roni Muhtar dalam keterangannya di Baubau, Minggu (3/11/2019)
Berdasarkan informasi yang dihimpun dari Dinas Pariwsata Baubau, sampai saat ini sudah ada sekira 200 Raja dan Sultan se-Asean telah menyatakan kesiapannya untuk menghadiri FKMA di Baubau.
Dengan kehadiran tamu tersebut, Roni berharap promosi pariwisata Baubau akan semakin luas, sebab para tamu bisa menyuarakan keindahan wisata Baubau ketika kembali ke daerahnnya masing-masing.(Foto-Diskominfo Baubau)

Baubau City Government Finalizes Preparation of Asean FKMA 2019
03 Nov 2019, 14:14 by Afrian Syah


Baubau City Government Finalizes Preparation of Asean FKMA 2019

KBRN, Baubau: Baubau City Government (Southeast Sulawesi City) as the host is increasingly solidifying preparations for the VI Polaton Indigenous Peoples Festival (FKMA), which is planned to be held November 18-21, 2019.
Baubau City Regional Secretary, Roni Muhtar said the technical preparations in organizing the International event had been discussed in detail by the regional committee.
As for several locations that will later become the center of the implementation of FKMA in Baubau including the Baruga Great Mosque of the Sultanate of Buton Sultanate, the public area of the City of Mara, and Palagimata.
Roni said that the regional committee consisting of regional apparatus organizations (OPD) had agreed to carry out the task as well as possible so that invited guests could get maximum service during the FKMA series.
"We have discussed the technical preparations in detail. So that they (guests) who were present in Baubau could get good service starting from lodging, eating places and so on. So that when leaving Baubau, they brought home a positive impression that Baubau was extraordinary," said Roni Muhtar in his statement in Baubau, Sunday (3/11/2019)
Based on information compiled from the Baubau Tourism Office, to date there have been approximately 200 Asean Kings and Sultans who have declared their readiness to attend FKMA in Baubau.
With the presence of these guests, Roni hopes that the promotion of Baubau tourism will be wider, because guests can voice the beauty of Baubau tourism when returning to their respective regions. (Photo-Diskominfo Baubau)
